actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide for royalty owners and independent producers an annual $1,200 credit against the crude oil windfall profit tax, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow royalty owners and independent producers a $300 quarterly refundable credit against the crude oil windfall profit tax. Denies any income tax deduction for amounts taken as such credits.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide for royalty owners and independent producers an annual $1,200 credit against the crude oil windfall profit tax, and for other purposes.
